name: Freyam Mehta
title: Student Developer
bio: A highly technical, team-oriented professional with passion for open source development with demonstrated ability to work through a problem effectively and provide the best solutions.
description:
I'm Freyam, a computer science student from India. I am passionate about finding clean and creative solutions to all kinds of problems. 
 My current interests include Data Science, UI/UX Designing, Data Structures and Algorithms, Artificial Intelligence, and Deep Learning. I love participating in Open Source Events throughout the world and contributing to organizations.
